resources.string: The application requires Location permission in order to scan for Bluetooth Low Energy devices.
The Bluetooth adapter is turned off. Click the button below to enable Bluetooth.
Please turn ON Location in order to use this app. Click the button below to enable Location.

1. Make sure Mockup is well pluged into power supply. 
2. Make sure Mockup is not connected to another device. 
3. Make sure Bluetooth and Location parameters are enabled. 
4. Make sure Location permission is granted. 
4. Please DO NOT change Bluetooth parameters. The app will automatically connect if Location and Bluetooth are enabled.
Device does not have required services.
